text: Lina Anatolyevna Cheryazova (, 1 November 1968 â€“ 23 March 2019) was an Uzbek freestyle skier. She won a gold medal at the 1994 Winter Olympics. Cheryazova was born in Tashkent, Uzbekistan. Cheryazova died on 23 March 2019 in Novosibirsk, Russia from complications of ALS, aged 50. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:Olympic gold medalists Category:Skiers Category:Sportspeople from Tashkent
title: Lina Cheryazova
